name: model_id
description: Unique model identifier (e.g., catboost_v8_33features_20260108_211817)

name: model_version
description: Model version (e.g., v8, v9)

name: model_type
description: Model architecture (e.g., catboost, xgboost, ensemble)

name: gcs_path
description: Full GCS path to model file

name: feature_count
description: Number of features the model expects

name: features_json
description: JSON array of feature names in order

name: training_start_date
description: First date of training data

name: training_end_date
description: Last date of training data

name: training_samples
description: Number of training samples

name: training_config_json
description: Hyperparameters and training configuration

name: evaluation_mae
description: Mean Absolute Error on evaluation set

name: evaluation_hit_rate
description: Hit rate on evaluation set (all predictions)

name: evaluation_hit_rate_edge_3plus
description: Hit rate for predictions with edge >= 3

name: evaluation_hit_rate_edge_5plus
description: Hit rate for predictions with edge >= 5

name: parent_model_id
description: Model this was derived from (for incremental training)

name: experiment_id
description: Link to ml_experiments table

name: git_commit
description: Git commit hash when model was trained

name: status
description: Model status: active, deprecated, testing, archived

name: is_production
description: Whether this model is currently in production

name: production_start_date
description: When this model entered production

name: production_end_date
description: When this model was retired from production

name: notes
description: Additional notes about the model

name: created_at
description: When this registry entry was created

name: created_by
description: Who created this entry
